creditline: Gift of funds from Bob Mersky and the Contemporary Art Affinity Group
medium: Acrylic, collage and oil stick on canvas
signed: Signed and dated on verso: Iva Gueorguieva 2013
text: In this large-scale canvas, Bulgarian-born Iva Gueorguieva combines abstracted fields of paint, cut fabric, scratches, textures, and lines in a chaotic swirl of activity and excess energy. The elements of the painting interact with such vitality that they seem to be in a constant state of metamorphosis. The overall effect of this enigmatic narrative is one of intense physicality that conjures shifting moods of anxiety, violence and heightened emotions.
title: Gathered Hiss
